subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Despite Coach Nick Saban’s mandate of not losing games with careless plays, Alabama might need A J McCarron to take some chances and make plays Saturday night against L.S.U.
snippet: Despite Coach Nick Saban’s mandate of not losing games with careless plays, Alabama might need A J McCarron to take some chances and make plays Saturday night against L.S.U.
